description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. DEEP allows players to control an underwater Remotely Operated Vehicle (ROV) to discover the depths of the deep-ocean.  Our goal is to promote topics in oceanography in a fun and unique way.
description.short: DEEP allows players to control an underwater Remotely Operated Vehicle (ROV) to discover the depths of the deep-ocean.  Our goal is to promote topics in oceanography in a fun and unique way.
